questions.question: What is the Prototype Design Pattern?
options: A design pattern used in software development
A pattern used to create new game characters
A pattern used in graphical user interfaces
A pattern used in database operations

questions.question: How is the Prototype Design Pattern used in software development?
options: To save time and resources in GUI development
